recipes.title: Veggie Stew
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C gas 5. Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well. 2. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 3. Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 4. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 5. Serve piping hot.

recipes.title: Veggie Pizza
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C gas 5. Add the pasata, green pepper and mushrooms to the base. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 30 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.method: 1. Roughly chop all the vegetables 2. Tear the feta into bite size chunks 3. Add all the ingredients to a large bowl 4. Add the olive oil, along with seasonings of choice and mix well
